EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Contact.FirstName},
I wanted to follow up and thank you for taking my call to discuss Shell Fleet Solutions. It was great to learn more about your business, and I’m convinced that you will find great value in our innovative card program.
Just to recap, here are our core pillars, and all the ways they will save your business money:
Savings - Discounts on every litre of fuel purchased at Shell locations - Get AIR MILES® Reward Miles* - Save up to 32%** off Shell Car Washes at participating locations - 10%*** off oil changes and other products and services at Jiffy Lube®
Security - Cancel lost or stolen cards instantly in real-time - Reduce risk of fraud and misuse with driver IDs and purchase controls - Chip and PIN provides added security
Convenience - Use at 1,350+ Shell stations or choose the Shell Fleet Navigator card for access anywhere Mastercard® is accepted - 24/7 customer support whenever you need us, plus dedicated account management - Access your online account anywhere, anytime
Control - Set limits and know who purchased what, where and when - View built-in reports detailing all aspects of fuelling activity or customize your own - Activate, suspend or cancel cards through our online account management program
I’ll plan to follow up with you next week regarding more ways Shell Fleet Solutions will save your business time and money. In the meantime, you can reach me at {!User.Phone} or {!User.Email} .
I look forward to speaking with you again soon.
Sincerely,
{!User.FirstName} {!User.LastName} {!User.Title} Phone - {!User.Phone} Fax - {!User.Fax} {!User.Email}
